title: Remove the “What are the terms and conditions?” FAQ entry

requirements.text: Remove the FAQ question titled “What are the terms and conditions?” from the FAQs page so it no longer appears anywhere on the /faqs route.

quotes: please remove the FAQ “what are the terms and conditions”

acceptanceCriteria: On the /faqs page, the accordion question text “What are the terms and conditions?” is not rendered.
No empty/blank accordion item remains in the Terms & Conditions section after removal.
The remaining FAQ items and section layout continue to render without visual or runtime errors.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
nonGoals: Configuring or changing the custom domain (e.g., luminarycompetition.com).
Reordering homepage sections or changing other FAQ items beyond the single requested question.
